name: OnPlayerCommandText
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
description: This callback is called when a player enters a command into the client chat window. Commands are anything that start with a forward slash, e.g. /help.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that entered a command.

params_body.name: cmdtext[]
params_body.description: The command that was entered (including the forward slash).

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts so returning 1 there blocks other scripts from seeing it.
related_fn: SendRconCommand: Sends an RCON command via the script.
related_cb:
OnPlayerText: Called when a player sends a message via the chat.
 OnRconCommand: Called when an RCON command is sent.
 SendRconCommand: Sends an RCON command via the script.
